column2: Harsco Corp. engages in the provision of industrial services and engineered products. The company is headquartered in Camp Hill, Pennsylvania and currently employs 9,900 full-time employees. The firm's divisions include Clean Earth, Harsco Environmental and Harsco Rail. Clean Earth division provides environmental services for a variety of contaminated materials including soils, dredged material and hazardous waste. The Harsco Environmental division operates primarily under long-term contracts, providing services and support to the steelmaking process, and environmental and zero waste solutions for manufacturing by-products within the metals industry. The Harsco Rail division is a provider of engineered maintenance equipment, after-market parts and safety and diagnostic systems which support railroad and transit customers worldwide.
